| HistoryText             = Captain Ultra is the team leader for the Nebraska team of the Initiative program. After Paragon, one of his team, killed fellow teammate Gadget, Griffin briefly fought [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Iron Man]] to protect the remainder of his team. Following assisting in investigating the circumstances of Paragon and Gadget's tragic deaths with [[Leonard Samson (Earth-616)|Doc Samson]] and Iron Man. During the course of their investigation it is revealed that there are two new Initiative recruits in the process of being fast-tracked to the Nebraska team, although Captain Ultra expressed irritation at the prospect of having to "babysit the punks".
